column1: '''Peregrin of the Tower Guard''' is the twenty-fifth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was not featured in the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''.
